alert.note: Alert for Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:18PM CDT until July 17 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Gainesville, or 23 miles north of Mountain Home, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norfork Lake, Bakersfield, Hardenville, Sycamore, Tecumseh, Dora, Zanoni, Udall and Rockbridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
